name: Exploding Bob
description:
If levels don't load in the embedded game, your browser is probably blocking third-party cookies. Try to unblock them or play the game directly here.
Exploding Bob

An educational game for first graders created for the Apps4Learning program.

Credits

Thanks to our grade 5 "clients" for the concept and design.
